api_list.name: Get Gas Price
api_list.description: Get the current gas price in wei
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sevit.p.rapidapi.com/gasprice"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sevit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sevit.p.rapidapi.com/gasprice"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sevit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
